data.comment: The match is underway at Estadio Caliente.
Goal kick for Puebla at Estadio Caliente.
In the minute 6, Ball goes out of play for a Puebla goal kick.
Tijuana de Caliente's Bryan Angulo breaks free at Estadio Caliente. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Puebla have a goal kick.
In the minute 9, Corner awarded to Tijuana de Caliente.
Tijuana de Caliente are pushing forward but Jordi Cortizo's finish is wide of the goal.
Diego Montano Robles awards Puebla a goal kick.
In the minute 10, Diego Montano Robles signals a free kick to Tijuana de Caliente in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Tijuana.
Can Puebla get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tijuana de Caliente's half?
In the minute 14, Free kick for Tijuana de Caliente in the half of Puebla.
Ball safe as Puebla is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick Puebla.
In the minute 18, Throw-in for Puebla in the half of Tijuana de Caliente.
Diego Montano Robles awards the away team a throw-in.
In Tijuana a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 22, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in Puebla.
Puebla have been awarded a corner by Diego Montano Robles.
In the minute 24, Tijuana de Caliente have been awarded a corner by Diego Montano Robles.
Diego Montano Robles signals a free kick to Puebla.
Puebla awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 29, Tijuana de Caliente's Bryan Angulo gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Tijuana.
Corner awarded to Tijuana de Caliente.
In the minute 31, Goal kick for Puebla at Estadio Caliente.
Tijuana de Caliente awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Tijuana de Caliente in their own half.
In the minute 34, Goal! Tijuana de Caliente have got their heads in front thanks to a Bryan Angulo strike.
Throw-in for Puebla in their own half.
Throw-in for Puebla at Estadio Caliente.
In the minute 39, Puebla to take a throw-in in Tijuana de Caliente territory.
Corner awarded to Puebla.
Israel Reyes for Puebla gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 40, Tijuana de Caliente have a goal kick.
Puebla have been awarded a corner by Diego Montano Robles.
Ball goes out of play for a Tijuana de Caliente goal kick.
In the minute 42, Corner awarded to Tijuana de Caliente.
Tijuana de Caliente have been awarded a corner by Diego Montano Robles.
Diego Montano Robles signals a free kick to Puebla in their own half.
In the minute 44, Diego Montano Robles signals a Puebla throw-in in Tijuana de Caliente's half.
Fabian Castillo of Tijuana de Caliente gets in a strike, but is off target.
Diego Montano Robles awards Puebla a goal kick.
In the minute 45, Corner awarded to Tijuana de Caliente.
Puebla awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Tijuana a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Tijuana de Caliente in their own half.
The fourth official's board shows 1 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
Diego Montano Robles blows to end the first-half.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway in Tijuana.
Free kick for Puebla in their own half.
Ball safe as Tijuana de Caliente is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 47, Diego Montano Robles signals a Tijuana de Caliente throw-in in Puebla's half.
Diego Montano Robles signals a free kick to Tijuana de Caliente.
Free kick for Tijuana de Caliente in the half of Puebla.
In the minute 50, Puebla awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick Tijuana de Caliente.
In the minute 52, Diego Montano Robles signals a free kick to Tijuana de Caliente in their own half.
Santiago Ormeno (Puebla) gets a yellow card.
Puebla awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 53, Throw-in for Puebla in the half of Tijuana de Caliente.
Puebla to take a throw-in in Tijuana de Caliente territory.
Free kick for Puebla in their own half.
In the minute 56, Can Puebla get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tijuana de Caliente's half?
Diego Montano Robles signals a free kick to Tijuana de Caliente.
The away team have replaced Pablo Gonzalez Diaz with Daniel Aguilar. This is the second substitution made today by Juan Reynoso.
In the minute 60, Alan Acosta is replacing Israel Reyes for Puebla at Estadio Caliente.
Puebla have been awarded a corner by Diego Montano Robles.
Jaime Gomez is replacing Edgar Lopez for the home team.
In the minute 64, Pablo Guede (Tijuana de Caliente) is making a third substitution, with Jordan Rezabala replacing Jordi Cortizo.
Tijuana de Caliente have been awarded a corner by Diego Montano Robles.
In the minute 65, Puebla have a goal kick.
Pablo Guede is making the team's second substitution at Estadio Caliente with Luis Gamiz replacing Marcel Ruiz.
Throw-in for Tijuana de Caliente in the half of Puebla.
Alan Acosta (Puebla) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 67, Puebla to take a throw-in in Tijuana de Caliente territory.
Free kick for Puebla in their own half.
Free kick in a good position for Puebla!
In the minute 70, Christian Rivera (Tijuana de Caliente) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 72, Diego Montano Robles signals a Puebla throw-in in Tijuana de Caliente's half.
The home team have replaced Miguel Barbieri with Jordan Silva. This is the fourth substitution made today by Pablo Guede.
The away team replace George Corral with Maximiliano Araujo.
Puebla needs to be cautious. Tijuana de Caliente have an attacking throw-in.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Tijuana.
In the minute 74, Free kick Puebla.
Tijuana de Caliente awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Tijuana de Caliente get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Puebla's half?
In the minute 76, Diego Montano Robles awards Puebla a goal kick.
Christian Rivera (Tijuana de Caliente) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Diego Montano Robles signals a throw-in for Puebla, close to Tijuana de Caliente's area.
Diego Montano Robles signals a free kick to Tijuana de Caliente in their own half.
In the minute 81, Puebla make their fourth substitution with Eduardo Herrera replacing Santiago Ormeno.
Ball goes out of play for a Puebla goal kick.
In the minute 83, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Diego Montano Robles signals a free kick to Puebla just outside Tijuana de Caliente's area.
In Tijuana Tijuana de Caliente attack through Luis Gamiz. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 84, Goal kick for Puebla at Estadio Caliente.
Diego Montano Robles signals a free kick to Puebla in their own half.
Free kick for Tijuana de Caliente in the half of Puebla.
In the minute 86, At Estadio Caliente, Nicolas Vikonis is shown a red card and sent off.
In Tijuana a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In Tijuana Tijuana de Caliente attack through Jordan Silva. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 88, Diego Montano Robles awards Puebla a goal kick.
Diego Montano Robles signals a free kick to Puebla.
Free kick for Puebla in the half of Tijuana de Caliente.
In the minute 89, Tijuana de Caliente awarded a free kick in their own half.
Daniel Aguilar for Puebla has been booked by Diego Montano Robles and receives a first yellow card.
Free kick for Puebla in their own half.
Free kick Puebla.
Maximiliano Perg for Puebla drives towards goal at Estadio Caliente. But the finish is unsuccessful.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 4 minutes of added time.
In Tijuana a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Tijuana de Caliente have been awarded a corner by Diego Montano Robles.
Free kick Puebla.
The match has come to a close in Tijuana. The final score is 1-0.
Alan Acosta (Puebla) has been booked for the second time by the referee and is off!
Gerson Vazquez is on a sub for Fabian Castillo for Tijuana de Caliente.
